sub_title: Certified Lean Six Sigma Black Belt | Lean Six Sigma Consultant - Trainer - Coach - Lean Specialist (self employed - retired)
summary:
❶For Operational Excellence based upon Lean  Six Sigma, Business Process Management/Analysis, Project Management and Quality Management please contact me via LinkedIn or text or WhatsApp me on +31 (0) 657 838 127
❷I am a versatile Certified Lean Six Sigma Black Belt, Project and Quality Manager always looking for new challenges to continue to solve business performance problems.
❸I have already more  than 30 years a proven track record working  as a (Senior) Black Belt, Project Manager, Quality Manager and Business Process analysis and improvement consultant in the ICT sector, especially the last 14 years combined with Operational Excellence to improve processes and value streams  based on Six Sigma, Lean and CMMi.
❹ I have a  solid higher education/academic and technical background, combined with good communication skills both at senior management as well as on the work/shop floor.  I really enjoy working with people on innovative projects, a seller/do-er where not only contributions to the physical solutions, but also to the financial results that bring real change, new insights and improvements for the organization and its employees.  
❺ My Specialties are as you might expect the reduction of the variation and the elimination of waste  in production and business processes through the application of Lean Six Sigma tools and techniques thereby following the DMAIC  (improving existing processes and  DMAD(O)V designing new processes with Lean and Six Sigma in mind 
❻ Elimination of waste in production- and business processes through the application of Lean tools and techniques such as (Electronic) 5S, Kaizen, Process and Value Stream Mapping, 3M, SMED, Poka-Yoke, Heijunka, Gemba  Walks and Ohno Circles, Hoshin Kanri etc.
❼ Project Management - execution, coaching, training (IPMA, Prince 2)
❽ CMMi V1.1/V1.2 assessments
❾ Member of Technical Committee IASSC
❿ Field-hockey and soccer referee, modern art lover, autodidact painter.

profile_positions.description: I have formally retired but are available with my Lean Six Sigma expertise for companies on a freelance basis. I am also now an associate of MKPC for MKPC's clients. (Services solely procurable via MKPC BV)
profile_positions.title: Executing Lean Six Sigma projects/training/consultancy - freelance - MKPC Associate

profile_positions.description:
Lean Consultant/ Trainer / Coach and Lean Six Sigma Black Belt responsible for :
	• Driving operational excellence through execution, support and coaching of projects using Lean and Six Sigma. 
• Business Development of Lean Six Sigma engagements  
• LEAN specialist, coach, manager (sensei) implementing 5S, Visual Management, Kaizen, Six Sigma, Kanban, Value Streams, roadmaps, root cause analysis. 
• Lean Specialist in optimizing Business Processes among those ITIL Service Desk process solutions.
• Organising and facilitating  Brown Paper Sessions to identify process problems.
• Developer of Lean and Six Sigma Training Material on White, Yellow, Orange, Green and Black Belt level as well as Lean Champion.
• Trainer in Lean and Six Sigma methodology on White, Yellow, Orange, Green and Black Belt level
• Accompanying aspiring Green Belts and Black Belts towards their practical certification and certifying them
• Member Technical Committee IASSC
profile_positions.title: Lean Six Sigma Consultant - Trainer - Coach and Certified Lean Six Sigma Black Belt

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the implementation of a government mandated directive NHG in the midoffices, which is provided by the Homeownership Guarantee Fund (WEW). Coordinate with the partner NHG on implementaion activities. This includes the whole mortgage processing chain from early contact with homeowners till collections and is required for all mortgage labels under management by the group.
•	Developed PID and projectplan
•	Project Management
•	Stakeholder management
•	Developed lean chain-processes for midoffice
•	Hosted Brown Paper sessions (Kaizen)
•	Liaise with other organisations in the chain
profile_positions.title: Project Manager and Lean Six Sigma Black Belt

profile_positions.description:
•	Drive the analyzing of the As-Is situations of a number of business processes and working with a team to lean/improve the processes and build a sustainable To-Be process situation.
•	Execute VoB,VoP and VoC actions as well as Stakeholder Management.

•	Developed the Business Architecture for the project.
•	Instrumental in the development and approval of the Project Initiation Document and the associated budget calculations and spend-plan.
•	Developed a product based project plan.
•	Organized and executed business process and architecture workshops.
profile_positions.title: Business Process Consultant and Six Sigma Black Belt

profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.title: Six Sigma Lean Black Belt (Cert.) and Senior Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Execute Continuous Improvement projects on the basis of  Six Sigma (DMAIC,DMADV) and Lean as Certified Black Belt.
•	Coach other Projact Managers, Six Sigma Black Belts, Green Belts and Yellow Belts leading high priority projects.

•	Consultant to Senior Management Team on Six Sigma, Lean and Project Management areas.
•	Facilitate and teach Six Sigma (DMAIC) and Lean tools and techniques. 
•	Facilitate strategy deployment supporting key business indicators and initiatives. 
•	Develop and maintain Six Sigma and Lean project portfolios.
•	Lead, manage, facilitate, introduce  and support Lean Kaizen projects on both management and worker levels. 
•	Advocates and influences appropriate business and operational process improvement strategies. 
•	Masters technical skills associated with Project Management, Lean, Six Sigma, CMMi.

•	Project Manager for set-up and maintaining Quality Assurance , Instance Readiness, Functional and User Acceptance Testing,  Planning, Management and Implementation and Reporting
profile_positions.title: Six Sigma Lean Black Belt (Cert.) and Senior Project Manager
